author: CBC News
title: Nova Scotia Co-operative Council to pay for program for prescription drugs
description: The Nova Scotia Co-operative Council is announcing they will fund 1,000 one-year memberships to Nova Scotians to help ease the financial strain brought on by the COVID-19 virus.
content:
The Nova Scotia Co-operative Council, which represents more than 300 co-operative businesses and credit unions in the province, will fund 1,000 one-year memberships to Nova Scotians for purchasing prescription drugs.
The move announced Friday is to help ease… [+1741 chars]
